channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游 17:31 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack continues
item.description: 游 17:31 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack continues This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
